column2:
```r
percent_usage <- count_usage %>% group_by(Continent) %>% mutate(percent_irrigation = (n_irrigation/tot_dams), percent_water_supply = (n_water_supply/tot_dams), percent_flood_control= (n_flood_control/tot_dams), percent_hydroelectricity= (n_hydroelectricity/tot_dams), percent_navigation = (n_navigation/tot_dams), percent_recreation= (n_recreation/tot_dams), percent_pollution_control = (n_pollution_control/tot_dams), percent_livestock_rearing= (n_livestock_rearing/tot_dams)) %>% select(Continent, percent_irrigation, percent_water_supply, percent_flood_control, percent_hydroelectricity, percent_navigation, percent_recreation, percent_pollution_control, percent_livestock_rearing)
```
